title: Moroccan baked chicken with chickpeas and rice
description: Equipment and preparation: You will need a wide, shallow, flameproof casserole with a domed lid, about 23cm/9in across the base. Failing that, use any flameproof casserole of 3 litres/5 pints capacity.
ingredients: 1x1.5-2kg/3½-4lb chicken, jointed in 8 pieces (or you could use a pack of 8 drumsticks and thighs)
2 fresh chillies, halved, de-seeded and finely chopped
salt and freshly milled black pepper
